law.catch_line: Agreement of golf course to comply with the provisions of KRS Chapter 344.

text.section: The Department of Alcoholic Beverage Control shall not issue a license to an applicant authorized to apply for a license to sell alcoholic beverages by the drink under KRS 243.039 unless the applicant and the golf course, if different from the applicant, agree to voluntarily comply with the provisions of KRS Chapter 344, whether or not the applicant and the golf course would otherwise be covered by the provisions of KRS Chapter 344.

The department shall revoke or suspend any license issued under KRS 243.039 if the department or the Kentucky Commission on Human Rights makes a finding that the applicant or the golf course, if different from the applicant, has violated a requirement specified in this section.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 12, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 559, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 411, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000.
